data.oai_dc:dc: Pollen development observations. We show results from observations of aniline blue stained pistils after three types of crosses, interspecific (Inter), Intraspecific (Intra), and self-cross (Self). The self compatibility phenotype of plants, as determined from seed counts (see methods), is provided: SC = self compatible, SI = self incompatible. Pistils were processed in batches, this information is included in the “Batchr” column.
Interspecific incompatibility|pollen-pistil interactions|pollen-pistil adhesion|reproductive barriers|self-incompatibility|SIxSC rule
